law.catch_line: In addition to any other penalty provided by law, a person is guilty of a misdemeanor and on convict...
law.text:
In addition to any other penalty provided by law, a person is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $100 or imprisonment not exceeding 30 days or both, if the person:
Interferes with the Secretary or a representative of the Secretary summarily abating a nuisance under § 10-203 of this title; or
Refuses to allow the Secretary or a representative of the Secretary to enter on any property for the purpose of summarily abating a nuisance under § 10-203 of this title.
